message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to both of us, as it is worth $15000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $14000. This represents a savings of $1000 compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for someone as discerning as yourself. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
